item.title: [ToDo] CS 181: Computers, Ethics, and Public Policy
item.description: The instructors of Home | Ethics of Technological Disruption have written a book: “System Error: Where Big Tech Went Wrong and How We Can Reboot” ( available on SPL ). The authors' main ideas: the question is not about values, but better/worse social outcomes; understanding the optimization mindset of the technologist is more helpful than understanding the underlying tech; government regulation can and has led to good outcomes; a libertarian approach, e.
